patthana8.6:4.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana8.6:4.2: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe ….
patthana8.6:4.4: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana8.6:4.6: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko ca nahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.6:5.1: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.6:5.2: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.6:5.3: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko ca nahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.6:6.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukañca nahetuṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.6:6.2: Nahetuṃ nasahetukañca nahetuṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.6:6.3: Nahetuṃ nasahetukañca nahetuṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko ca nahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.6:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.
patthana8.6:10.1: Nahetu nasahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.6:10.2: Nahetu nasahetuko dhammo nahetussa naahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana8.6:11.1: Nahetu naahetuko dhammo nahetussa naahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.6:11.2: Nahetu naahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.6:12.1: Ārammaṇe cattāri … pe … anantare cattāri … pe … sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme … pe … jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
